Text:
Heh... My sword is looking for blood
tonight!
Nothing can stand against my blade!
Come on then, worshippers of false gods!
Why aren't you coming to me??

Pay no heed to the woman with the long sword!
Do not attack her! Aim for their archers!
Hey! Who do you think I am?!
W-Wow... It's like she's trying to avoid us!
It is as you can see! Just ignore her!

I can't believe there are really people truly
abandoned by every god!
Is that what your priests tell you?!

Stop messing around and fight back! Otherwise,
they'll concentrate their attacks on me!

That said, they're clearly trained for battle.
They instantly realized Gamma's sword
skills and changed plans to focus on me.
There!
I am getting stronger...but their blows are pretty strong too!

I get it, I get it! I can be like a wall or
something!
Hyaaaa!!!
Heh... Try staying away!

I'm kinda scared of you getting swallowed up if you
go that far...
I heard that!
Haha, you're almost like a stormâ€•
Storm...!
I've thought of something good!

A sound strategy coming from you would be something
like buckling me on a shield, right?!

That's not a bad idea...but what I actually have in
mind is far from sound. It's an offensive strategy
that you can do really well!
Well... Okay then, what is it?
What do you think?

E-Erm... Let's just say...I personally feel it
won't look very cool?

But you'd be able to kill a lot of enemies with
your sword, you know.
Indeed... It would seem so...!
Fine! I'll leave the timing to you!

Soon! You have some distance, and they're packed
together!

Over there! I'm gonna drive them into that spot
Get ready!
Anytime!
I'm not sure about this...but I'm sending you in!
You've got this!
Ebony Swirl and Shoot!
I'll cut you to pieces...urk?!
Agghhh!!!

Sh-She fired that cursed woman like an arrow?!
This is dangerousâ€•don't clump up! Spread out!
B-Butâ€•
Spread out, I said!
Well, thank you for splitting up.
Gahhh... N-No...!

When they're in close formations, their defenses are
strong, and their magic defenses are enhanced. Which
doesn't make for a happy Beta.

It was great that we could really scatter them thanks
to you, Gamma.

Th-The world is spinning...! But I feel like I got
used for something good...!

Just with this swirl attack you killed double what
I took down.
Huh?!
Heh... My extra-long sword is extra sharp tonight!
Now, to turn you scum into rust on my blade!

Keep your distance and ignore her! Go for the
archer! Don't let her shoot that woman at us again!
Why do you keep ignoring me!

If we keep cutting down their numbers like
this...then I'm sure the real enemy will be
drawn out!
